explains: n. （尤指因种族、宗教或政治信仰而进行的）迫害，残害；烦扰

sentences.en: It is the memory and threat of persecution that binds them together.
sentences.cn: 是受迫害的记忆和威胁将他们紧紧联系在一起。

sentences.en: Yet, as often as not, they find themselves the target of persecution rather than praise.
sentences.cn: 然而，他们往往发现自己是迫害对象，而不是表扬对象。

sentences.en: Tom had become indifferent to persecution by this time.
sentences.cn: 这时，汤姆已经对和这跟迫害差不多的治疗麻木不仁。
